categories.name: Main Course

items.name: Classic Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and extra virgin olive oil. A traditional Italian starter.

items.name: Crispy Calamari Rings
items.description: Golden fried squid rings served with marinara sauce and lemon wedges. Perfectly seasoned and crispy.

items.name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with wild mushrooms, white wine, parmesan cheese, and fresh herbs.

items.name: Grilled Atlantic Salmon
items.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Classic Roman pasta with pancetta, eggs, pecorino romano cheese, and black pepper. Rich and creamy.

items.name: Pesto Penne Pasta
items.description: Penne pasta tossed in homemade basil pesto sauce with pine nuts, parmesan, and cherry tomatoes.

items.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
items.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizza with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

items.name: Diavola Pizza
items.description: Spicy pizza topped with spicy salami, mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, and fresh chili peppers.

items.name: Classic Tiramisu
items.description: Traditional Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and cocoa powder.

items.name: Artisan Gelato
items.description: Homemade Italian gelato available in various flavors. Ask your server for today's selection.

items.name: Italian Cappuccino
items.description: Authentic Italian cappuccino made with freshly ground Arabica beans and steamed milk foam.

items.name: House Wine Selection
items.description: Carefully selected Italian wines by the glass. Red, white, and ros√© options available.
